DOC.brief_summary: Medical condition investigation : Osteoarthritis hip knee Number patient plan : 480 adult patient Main objective : To evaluate compare tolerability profile Dexibuprofen Gebro 400 mg powder oral suspension compare Ibuprofen 400 mg patient painful osteoarthritis hip knee Secondary objective : To compare overall efficacy Dexibuprofen Gebro 400 mg powder oral suspension compare Ibuprofen 400 mg patient suffer different complaint due painful osteoarthritis hip knee
DOC.brief_title: Dexibuprofen 400 mg Sachet Versus Ibuprofen 400 mg Sachet Patients With Osteoarthritis Hip Knee
DOC.criteria: male female patient age 18 75 year everyday joint pain past three month global pain intensity involve joint ( hip knee ) `` moderate '' `` severe '' within last 48 h acute inflammation ischaemic necrosis paget 's disease , chondrocalcinosis , ochronosis hip/knee joint slowly progress hip/knee arthropathy particular tuberculosis aetiology hip/knee arthropathy due diabetes mellitus Charcot 's joint villous synovitis chondromatosis synovium patient exist gastritis exist ulcer bleeding gastrointestinal tract patient history gastrointestinal ulcer gastrointestinal haemorrhage past 6 month
